summary:
-Senior Geologist/Geophysicist with  more than 20 years experience in the Oil & Energy Industry, Research and Academia.
-Academic core strength gained by 3 sponsored Master degrees.
-Worked for 3 Universities: Universidad Central del Ecuador, Universidad Estatal Península de Santa Elena and Technical University of Delft.
-Worked  for top international companies: Shell, SGS Horizon B.V., Schlumberger, Repsol-YPF, etc. 
-Supported technical, commercial, organizational and safety & security teams
-Motivated and persevering personality with a friendly and modest style 
-Client relations focused, able to see the big picture and monitor market activities
-Multilingual: native Spanish, fluent  English and medium level Dutch 
TECHNICAL  
Geoscientist on a variety of roles such as: seismic interpreter, modeler, production geologist, well-site, explorer and geo-environmentalist. I have a strong technical background in 2D&3D seismic interpretation from regional to field scale .I have great experience working for integrated subsurface modeling and field development projects. I have been exposed to onsite operations in challenging environments such as the Amazonas jungle, Gabon and Siberia. As explorer, I have worked in data rooms for regional play analysis to detailed prospect evaluation. I have experience in uncertainty analysis and risk assessment. I possess knowledge of GIS and remote sensing. I am passionate about volcanology and done research on ash beds in South Africa. I have contributed to the implementation of HSSE corporate policies. 

PERSONAL
I am an enthusiastic person who posses excellent organizing and planning skills. I am responsible and have a sense on timely project delivery. I have lead several project teams successfully. I am proactive in sharing knowledge with colleagues and enjoy coaching new professionals. I am adaptable to diverse cultures and environments, besides being flexible to work independent or in multidisciplinary teams.
